title: The Best Movies to Celebrate the End of Summer
author: Camilla Cavendish
description: As summer fades, celebrate with these uplifting, end-of-summer movies that capture the joy and bittersweetness of the season.
article: As the days grow shorter and the summer warmth fades, it's the perfect time to soak in the last rays of the season with a collection of movies that embody the spirit of summer. These films capture the nostalgia of warm days spent outside, the excitement of summer romance, and the inevitable transition to fall. Whether you're into heartwarming stories or adventures that will transport you back to those carefree days, these movies offer a little something for everyone.

recipes.title: Ratatouille
recipes.description: Made with thinly sliced vegetables like zucchini, eggplant, and tomatoes, layered and baked in a savory sauce.
recipes.article: Ratatouille, the iconic French dish, is a celebration of the simplicity and beauty of fresh vegetables, artfully layered and baked. Its depiction in the movie of the same name highlights the care and precision involved in French culinary traditions.
recipes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

recipes.title: Spaghetti and Meatballs
recipes.description: A romantic meal made famous by the iconic spaghetti-sharing scene between Lady and Tramp.
recipes.article: Spaghetti and Meatballs, a classic Italian-American dish, symbolizes comfort and romance, especially made famous in Disney's 'Lady and the Tramp'.
recipes.author: Melissa Clark

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.description: A decadent, moist chocolate cake inspired by the scene where Bruce Bogtrotter devours the entire cake.
recipes.article: Chocolate Cake is the ultimate dessert indulgence, especially the version devoured by Bruce Bogtrotter in 'Matilda'.
recipes.author: Claire Saffitz

movies.title: Ratatouille
movies.description: This famous dish is the signature recipe in the Pixar film Ratatouille.
movies.article: Ratatouille is not just a film about cooking; it's about the art of food.
movies.author: Brad Bird

movies.title: Julie & Julia
movies.description: A movie that intertwines the life of Julia Child and a young woman named Julie, who sets out to cook every recipe from Child's famous cookbook.
movies.article: Julie & Julia captures the essence of mastering the art of French cooking.
movies.author: Nora Ephron

movies.title: Chef
movies.description: A story of a professional chef who, after a public meltdown, reinvents himself by starting a food truck business.
movies.article: Chef provides a refreshing take on the culinary world, blending gourmet cuisine with street food culture.
movies.author: Jon Favreau

title: Fall Recipes and the TV Shows That Go Well With Them
author: Chef Daniel Boulud
description: Embrace the cozy vibes of fall with hearty recipes paired perfectly with binge-worthy TV shows for the season.
article: Autumn is the season of comfort food and long nights spent indoors, making it the perfect time to pair your favorite fall recipes with the best TV shows for cozy nights in.

recipes.title: Butterbeer
recipes.description: A creamy, buttery concoction served hot or cold, famously enjoyed by students at Hogwarts.
recipes.article: Butterbeer, the magical drink from the 'Harry Potter' series, is as creamy and comforting as it sounds.
recipes.author: Priya Krishna

recipes.title: Lemon Cakes
recipes.description: Sansa Stark's favorite treat, these citrusy cakes are a sweet and delicate addition to any tea.
recipes.article: Lemon Cakes, beloved by Sansa Stark from 'Game of Thrones', are delicate, sweet, and tangy treats.
recipes.author: Genevieve Ko

recipes.title: Big Kahuna Burger
recipes.description: A juicy Hawaiian-style burger, often served with pineapple and special sauce.
recipes.article: Big Kahuna Burger, the fictional burger from 'Pulp Fiction', packs bold Hawaiian flavors into a juicy, satisfying bite.
recipes.author: Kenji López-Alt

movies.title: Burnt
movies.description: The story of a chef seeking redemption by aiming for a third Michelin star.
movies.article: Burnt explores the intense and often unforgiving world of Michelin-starred kitchens.
movies.author: John Wells

movies.title: Eat Pray Love
movies.description: A movie about self-discovery and indulgence, with one segment focused on Italy, where the protagonist immerses herself in Italian food culture.
movies.article: Eat Pray Love's segment in Italy is a love affair with food.
movies.author: Ryan Murphy

movies.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
movies.description: A story about the clash and eventual fusion of two culinary worlds: traditional French cuisine and vibrant Indian food.
movies.article: The Hundred-Foot Journey is a culinary adventure that celebrates the fusion of French and Indian cuisine.
movies.author: Lasse Hallström

title: Spooky Halloween Movie Night Essentials
author: Jane Doe
description: Get ready for Halloween with this guide to the best spooky movies and the perfect snacks to enjoy while watching them.
article: Halloween is the ultimate time to indulge in a spooky movie marathon, complete with eerie decorations and a platter of frightfully good snacks. From cult classics like 'Hocus Pocus' to modern-day thrillers like 'Hereditary', there’s no shortage of films to get you into the spooky spirit.

recipes.title: Eggs in a Basket
recipes.description: A simple yet delightful dish where an egg is fried inside a slice of bread.
recipes.article: Eggs in a Basket, made famous in 'V for Vendetta', is a simple yet charming breakfast dish where an egg is fried inside a slice of bread.
recipes.author: Sohla El-Waylly

recipes.title: Sopa de Tortilla
recipes.description: A traditional Mexican soup made with fried tortilla strips, tomatoes, and chiles.
recipes.article: Sopa de Tortilla, a Mexican classic, warms the soul with its hearty mix of fried tortillas, tomatoes, and chilies.
recipes.author: Yewande Komolafe

recipes.title: Timpano
recipes.description: A baked pasta dish filled with layers of meatballs, pasta, cheese, and hard-boiled eggs.
recipes.article: Timpano, featured in the movie 'Big Night', is a show-stopping Italian dish filled with layers of pasta, meatballs, cheese, and eggs.
recipes.author: Sam Sifton

movies.title: Big Night
movies.description: Two Italian immigrant brothers try to save their struggling restaurant by preparing a magnificent feast.
movies.article: Big Night is a film that celebrates Italian cooking in its most authentic form.
movies.author: Stanley Tucci, Campbell Scott

movies.title: The Trip
movies.description: A comedic journey of two friends traveling across England, eating at gourmet restaurants while discussing life.
movies.article: The Trip is a unique blend of humor and food exploration.
movies.author: Michael Winterbottom

movies.title: Jiro Dreams of Sushi
movies.description: A documentary about Jiro Ono, an 85-year-old sushi master and his relentless pursuit of perfection in making sushi.
movies.article: Jiro Dreams of Sushi is a profound exploration of perfection in the culinary world.
movies.author: David Gelb
